text: hi how are you today?
I am well, how are you?
I am good do you have any children?
Yes, I have two. And you?
I have two also but mine are grown and gone now
That's nice. How old are they?
32 and 29 a boy and a girl and 4 grand kids 3 girls and 1 boy ages 6 to 14. Unfortunately they all live far away. And you?
Oh my! That's nice. My kids are 4 and 7. Boy and girl.
That was a hectic but really fun time for me and my kids. Have you ever heard of Save the Children?
I have not. What is the charity and what do they do?
I am not an expert but I believe they help children in war torn areas to get to safety and make food and medical supplies available

That seems like a really noble cause. I have an affinity for children. I donate a lot of money to battered wives and their children. I spend a lot of time in the shelter for them too. Seems like a great cause!
Would you be willing to donate something to this cause?
With the commitment I made to the shelter, I would not donate at this time.
I can understand that I donate regularly to St Judes Childrens hospital myself. I appreciate your commitment to your cause and it is an important one.
Thank you for your recognition. St Judes is such a great cause too. I have donated a few times to them too.
Yours is so much more hands on and personal i really admire your dedication because you also donate your time and yourself and it sets a good example for your children to Kudos to you.
Thank you. do you do any volunteer work?

Not officially I am kind of the one that even strangers come up to and talk to when something is going wrong in their life and I try to encourage and comfort them and point them to a helping hand if I know of one. Like a shelter or a free counseling place or a food bank.
That serves a purpose too! I work with my local goverment in policy development and people like you really make a great impression on the policy that is created. Great job!
